Whole Chicken 1 

Red Chilli Powder 2 tsp 

Oil 1 Tbsp 

Yogurt 1 cup 

Ginger-Garlic Paste 1 Tbsp 

Lemons 2 

Butter 1 tsp 

Leaves Powdered 1 tsp fenugreek 

Garlic Cloves 3-4 

Onion 1 

Potatoes Cubed 2 

Salt A Pinch

1. Mix oil, red chilli powder, yogurt, ginger-garlic paste and lemon juice, mix well. Add fenugreek leaves powdered, salt and butter, mix well and stuff it in chicken. 

2. Fill the cavity with lemon , garlic cloves and onion. Take a roasting tray and add cubed potatoes, onions, garlic, salt and marinating paste to it. 

3. Place the chicken and put it in oven at 180ËšC for 45 minutes to an hour or until done. 

4. Once cooked, brush some of the melted fat on the chicken. 

5. Garnish with coriander and lemon.
